previous.excerpt:
Go to http://www.audible.com/screencrush or text screencrush to 500 500 to get your free trial. 

WandaVision is in the endgame now with a HUGE series reveal. It turns out that Wanda, Vision, Monica, SWORD, Darcy, Jimmy--everyone--is being manipulated by Agatha Harkness. Who knows how deep this thing goes, your mom might even be involved. We breakdown every easter eggs, marvel reference, and clue that Agnes was behind everything, all along.

Also, Kathryn Hahn is a national treasure.

Marvel Cinematic Universe

If you're new, Subscribe! → http://bit.ly/subscribe-screencrush

Go here → http://screencrush.com/
Like us → https://www.facebook.com/ScreenCrush
Follow us → https://twitter.com/screencrushnews
Get our newsletter → http://screencrush.com/newsletter/

Written and Hosted by Ryan Arey (http://twitter.com/ryanarey)
Edited by Katherine Woloson and Ryan Arey (http://twitter.com/ryanarey)

localize.title: 万达视界第7集：每一个复活节彩蛋+全面分解
localize.description:
前往http://www.audible.com/screencrush，或发短信screencrush到500 500即可获得免费试用。

万达视界现在已经进入尾声了，一个巨大的系列揭秘。原来万达、幻视、莫妮卡、SWORD、达西、吉米------所有人都被阿加莎-哈克尼斯操纵了。谁也不知道这件事有多深，你妈妈甚至可能被卷入其中。我们分析了每一个复活节彩蛋，奇迹的参考，以及艾格尼丝一直以来都在幕后操纵一切的线索。

还有，凯瑟琳-哈恩是国宝级的人物。

漫威电影宇宙

如果你是新来的，请订阅! → http://bit.ly/subscribe-screencrush

请点击这里 → http://screencrush.com/
喜欢我们 → https://www.facebook.com/ScreenCrush
关注我们 → https://twitter.com/screencrushnews
获取我们的通讯 → http://screencrush.com/newsletter/

编辑：Katherine Woloson和Ryan Arey (http://twitter.com/ryanarey)

localize.title: 萬達視界第7集：每一個復活節彩蛋+全面分解
localize.description:
前往http://www.audible.com/screencrush，或發短信screencrush到500 500即可獲得免費試用。

萬達視界現在已經進入尾聲了，一個巨大的系列揭祕。原來萬達、幻視、莫妮卡、SWORD、達西、吉米------所有人都被阿加莎-哈克尼斯操縱了。誰也不知道這件事有多深，你媽媽甚至可能被捲入其中。我們分析了每一個復活節彩蛋，奇蹟的參考，以及艾格尼絲一直以來都在幕後操縱一切的線索。

還有，凱瑟琳-哈恩是國寶級的人物。

漫威電影宇宙

如果你是新來的，請訂閱! → http://bit.ly/subscribe-screencrush
